title: pO pO pO jaganmAyaiyE
sahitya:
pO pO pO jaganmAyaiyai kiTTa varAdE poi manattin shAyaiyE


anupallavi

�tO tO�venrAl mIdErit-tOLai oDippAi nI tOzhan pOl vandennai vAzhvoTTAdaDippAi


caraNam    tinnak-koDuppadu pOl annattilE piDit-teru maNNaip-pOTTiDuvAi
annai pOl vandu pin arakkiyAi ennaip-pErAbattil mATTiDuvAi
singAra sETTaigaL kATTi naDippAi sikkiya mUDharin uyiraik-kuDippAi
tangak-karattinAl taTTik-koDuppAi taDi koNDu pinnavar talaiyai uDaippAi
